Sample consisted of car drivers with B type driving licence driving a car in the past 12 months. At the first stage settlements were categorized on the basis of the number of cars, and 9 settlement strata emerged as a result. The number of persons to be interviewed was defined using the weight defined on the basis of the number of cars, and from the potential persons the respondents were randomly selected.
Posted self-administered questionnaires.
